page.title: 12AMMENETIES
page.content: The area is a remote rural area and consequently it gets services one would expect in such a place.There are no street lights ,no mains gas and no buses but the local council provides a refuse collection once a week, a library van every three weeks, snow clearance in Winter, education and the transport to get to the seat of learning including a mobile nursery. Most of the houses have mains water and septic tank drainage, electricity, and telephone. The postman will also take letters for posting as well as delivering them. The milkman also delivers newspapers and basic groceries on the six days a week he calls. There are several mobile shops which visit on different days bringing most foodstuffs.
